GradientImpl, GradientImplIE
public abstract class Gradient
extends Object

Canvas gradient which may be used as a fill or stroke style.

addColorStop

public abstract void addColorStop(double offset,
                                  String color)
Adds a color at an offset point to the gradient.

Parameters:
offset - the offset at which to apply the color stop
color - the actual color value of the color stop
